DOC.brief_summary: It aim study compare effect 6 week either high-intensity interval training ( HIT ; carry correctly assess 85-95 % maximal heart rate ) , pyramid , continuous endurance training , change physical exercise capacity cardiac patient . The three exercise arm ( isocaloric ) compose follow : Endurance training ( n=15 ) : 31min 65-75 % HRmax ; HIT ( n=15 ) : 4x4min interval 85-95 % HRmax divide 3x3min active recovery 60-70 % HRmax , make total 25min ; Pyramids ( n=15 ) : One Pyramid consist 8 one-minute block . Those group start one block 70-75 % HRmax , follow one block 75-80 % HRmax another one 80-85 % HRmax . The top pyramid 2 block 85-90 % HRmax . Intensity lower afterwards one block 80-85 % HRmax , follow one block 75-80 % HRmax last one 70-75 % HRmax . Two pyramid follow , divide 2min active recovery 65-70 % HRmax , make total 28min . All protocol initiate 5min warm-up end 5min cool-down , 60-70 % HRpeak . Primary Outcome : Individual maximum power output watt ( Pmax ) . Secondary Outcome : Change power output watt lactate threshold 2 4 mmol/l .
DOC.brief_title: Different Endurance Training Protocols Cardiac Rehabilitation
DOC.criteria: At least one follow diagnosis within previous 3 month : acute coronary syndrome ( STEMI ) acute coronary syndrome ( NSTEMI ) aortocoronary bypass surgery PCI stable coronary heart disease Unstable angina pectoris Heart failure ( NYHA IV ) Acute endomyocarditis acute infection Pulmonary artery embolism phlebothrombosis within previous 6 month Hemodynamically unstable arrhythmia Hypertrophic cardiomyopathy participation another study within previous 6 month Medical condition prevent patient comply exercise program
